      • execute

        ForkedServer execute(ForkOptions config)
                     throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Fork a Brooklyn process with the given set of options.
        Returns:
        A callable that can be waited on the for forked process' termination.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if a process could not be forked.
